title: Request Documents from a Client
description: To respond to discovery, a paralegal needs to request a specific set of documents from the client.

tasks.description: Review the opposing party's document requests to determine what documents are needed from the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of required documents.

tasks.description: Draft a clear and organized request letter to the client, listing the specific documents needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a letter that is easy for the client to understand and act on.

tasks.description: Set up a secure portal for the client to upload the requested documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a secure and convenient way for the client to transfer files.
